get.description:
Retrieve a list of examples with optional search functionality. Only returns active examples (status_id != 1).
Refer to the sample code in 'server/modules/example/*'.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search term to filter examples by name or description (case-insensitive)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

post.description:
Create a new example with the provided data. Name must be unique within the client.
Refer to the sample code in 'server/modules/example/*'.

name.description: Example name (must be unique within client)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

409.description: Conflict - Example with same name already exists

message.example: Example with this name "My Example" already exists

get.description:
Retrieve detailed information of a specific example by its ID.
Refer to the sample code in 'server/modules/example/*'.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

put.description:
Update an existing example with the provided data. Name must be unique within the client if changed.
Refer to the sample code in 'server/modules/example/*'.

name.description: Example name (must be unique within client)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

409.description: Conflict - Example with same name already exists

message.example: Example with this name "Updated Example Name" already exists

delete.description:
Soft delete an example by setting its status_id to 1 (inactive). The example will no longer appear in active lists but remains in the database.
Refer to the sample code in 'server/modules/example/*'.
